member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.DataTreeGrid
member.summary: Gets the DataTreeGrid control instance of the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the current item, displayed within the DataTreeGrid control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.ContentChanged
member.summary: Occurs when content changes for the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the hierarchical indentation level of the current item in the containing collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.HierarchyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the hierarchy (i.e. indentation level) changes for the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IndentationWidth
member.summary: Gets the indentation width of the current item, based on Indentation and DataTreeGrid.IndentationUnitSize. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.HasChildren
member.summary: Gets whether the current item has children within the containing hierarchical collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.HasChildrenChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the HasChildren property value of the current item changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current item is expanded or not, if it is a parent node (i.e. has child items). This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.ExpansionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the expansion state of the current item changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.ExpanderVisibility
member.summary: Gets a Visibility value that indicates whether the current item has an expander to be displayed, i.e. it is a parent node. This is a dependency value.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets whether the current item is visible in the view (a parent node that is not expanded would have its child items not visible). This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.VisibilityChanged
member.summary: Occurs when visibility of the current item changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Visibility
member.summary: Gets a Visibility value that indicates whether the current item is visible in the view. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that contains information that is associated with the current item.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a data property value of the item changes.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ExpandAll
member.summary: Expands all parent nodes in the hierarchy.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.CollapseAll
member.summary: Collapses all parent nodes in the hierarchy.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.EnsureValidHierarchy
member.summary: Resets any invalid indentation values in order to obtain a valid node hierarchy.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Items
member.summary: Gets a collection of DataTreeGridItem objects that represent the individual items in the DataTreeGrid control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IsAsyncPresentationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous presentation mode is enabled (true by default). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IsAsyncPresentationEnabledMinCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items to be initially loaded synchronously when using asychronous presentation mode within the control (having IsAsyncPresentationEnabled property set to true). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IsAsyncPresentationEnabledPageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items to be loaded synchronously as one step when using asychronous presentation mode within the control (having IsAsyncPresentationEnabled property set to true). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ExpanderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template used for displaying node expanders in the DataTreeGridColumn cells. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IndentationUnitSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation left padding used for each hierarchical level in the view. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ItemPropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a data property value of an item within the control changes.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ItemCollectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the data item collection within the control changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the item at the specified index in the collection.
member.param: The index to get the item at.
member.returns: The item at the specified index in the collection.
